slack.description: MCP server providing access to the Slack API for messaging, channel management, user lookup, and workspace operations
capabilities: list_channels — List public and private channels in the workspace
post_message — Post a message to a channel or DM
reply_to_thread — Reply to a specific message thread
add_reaction — Add an emoji reaction to a message
get_channel_history — Retrieve recent messages from a channel
get_thread_replies — Get all replies in a message thread
get_users — List users in the workspace
get_user_profile — Get detailed profile info for a user
search_messages — Search for messages across the workspace
